      • generateTimeWindowDate

        public static java.util.Date[] generateTimeWindowDate(int timeToAdd)
        Build an array containing the date min and max from today's date.
        Parameters:
        timeToAdd - number of day to add from current date
        Returns:
        An array that contain 2 Date object, before(0) and after(1).
